document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalogue of bird lice (Insecta: Phthiraptera) from Chile

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalogue of bird lice (Insecta: Phthiraptera) from Chile

Liotheum ( Menopon ) transversus
[sic]

, pl. 21: fig. 7.

, pl. 20: fig. 3.

Austromenopon transversum ( Denny, 1842 )

subSubSection.paragraph:
Chilean hosts:
Larus dominicanus Lichtenstein, 1823
,
Larus pipixcan Wagler, 1831
.

Other hosts:
Pagophila eburnea (Phipps, 1774)
;
Rhodostethia rosea (Macgillivray, 1924)
;
Rissa brevirostris (Bruch, 1853)
;
Xema sabini (Sabine, 1819)
;
Creagrus furcatus (Neìboux, 1842)
and at least 20 species of
Larus
and
Leucophaeus
(see
Price et al . 2003: 93
).

Chilean reference:
González-Acuña et al . (2011a)
;
González-Acuña et al . (2020b)
.

Remarks:
Austromenopon transversum
is the only species of this genus parasitic on species of gulls (
Price et al . 2003: 93
, 290).

Bonomiella Conci, 1942
. Studi Trentini Scienze Naturali 23 (2), 124. Type species:
Bonomiella insolitunguicolata Conci, 1942
(by original designation).
